Notes: Privately-owned; Listed on Toronto Exchange Nov 2003-June 2014
Founded 1997 as SiGEM; Acquired by iCabbi (Renault) Dec 2019
Acquired by Verifone 2015; Verifone acquired by Francisco Partners 2018; Became Curb Mobility March 2019
Active in Australia, US, UK, Ireland, Europe, New Zealand, Middle East
